wikipedia_page.main: Hayley Parsons  (born 22 November 1973) is a Welsh entrepreneur and investor, most notable as the founder of British financial services comparison website GoCompare.

response: Goco was established in November 2006 and is based in Newport, Wales. The company's founder was Hayley Parsons, who worked for Admiral Insurance for 14 years, and was formerly head of business development at Confused.com. Parsons was replaced as CEO by Jon Morrell following a takeover by insurance company esure in March 2015
* Ms Hayley Parsons. Founder and Chief Executive, Gocompare.com. For services to the Economy.
